text: Mohammad Kalantor is a Bangladeshi art director. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Art Direction five times for the films Dui Bodhu Ek Swami (2003), Hajar Bachhor Dhore (2005), Megher Koley Rod (2008), Gangajatra (2009), Raja Surja Khan (2012). ==Selected films== * Dui Bodhu Ek Swami - 2003 * Dui Noyoner Alo - 2005 * Hajar Bachhor Dhore - 2005 * Ek Takar Bou - 2008 * Megher Koley Rod - (2008) * Gangajatra - 2009 * Raja Surja Khan - 2012 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! title: Mohammad Kalantor
